name: Cat Knock
description:
Slingshot like control. You launch cat with variable force in any direction to strike blocks with loot and abilities and crash fort walls!

You have slow-mo to aim, plan and be tactical.

Level completion usually looks like a dance between objectives and obstacles.

There is a companion in every level whom helps player to loot more gold coins. But she is fragile, so be careful in your destruction.

Consider that your superhero style take off causes damage to target blocks and your companion.

Game is very easy to operate but has depth to master.

Choose order to execute targets or crush everything like a monster if it is suitable. Match blocks in combo or oneshot the whole level.

That candy looking thing, acts like a shotgun when you crush it hard enough.

Survival aspect:
Earn gold by demolishing blocks in the fort.
Pay 88 gold for next fort.
Be effective in time, hits count, combos and more to earn more gold.

Your progress is noted by collection of beautiful fishes on the wall inside the castle :)

Have fun!

Why cats knock things over?
Maybe, so to find gold coins..
